On Sunday against the Warriors, the talk will subside and the 18-year-old Queenslander will have to walk the walk.

articles.author: Callum Twomey with Aaron Pereira
articles.title: Star defender signs mega-deal, turns back on free agency - AFL
articles.description: Richmond's Nick Vlastuin set to be a one-club player after inking massive long-term deal
articles.content:
RICHMOND has locked in Nick Vlastuin to a mega five-year deal as the important defender turned his back on free agency.
